metadata.name: Bone Buddies #1
metadata.description: Artistically curated drawings of 2000 unique collectible NFTs. Each one of one Bone Buddy not only provides you with a banging PFP, it also doubles as an exclusive holders BONE$ token which grants access to members only benefits like community giveaways, NFT airdrops, raffles & more. Remember, all Bone Buddies are dope, but some are rarer than others Visit [bonebuddies.io](https://bonebuddies.io) for more details.
